duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate plans, organize resources, direct personnel, and develop policies in the Pathology Laboratory as directed by the Medical Director.
Have twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week line responsibility of the department and sections of the laboratory to ensure implementation of the medical/clinical programs.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.

education_certification.credential: MD or equivalent, with Board Certification in Pathology
